an8.80:4.1: * “Aṭṭhimāni, bhikkhave, kusītavatthūni.
an8.80:4.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti.
an8.80:4.6: Kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilamissati.
an8.80:4.8: So nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:5.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṃ kataṃ hoti.
an8.80:5.4: Kammaṃ kho pana me karontassa kāyo kilanto.
an8.80:5.6: So nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.

an8.80:6.4: Maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilamissati.
an8.80:6.6: So nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:7.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā maggo gato hoti.
an8.80:7.4: Maggaṃ kho pana me gacchantassa kāyo kilanto.
an8.80:7.6: So nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:8.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto na labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ.
an8.80:8.3: ‘ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto nālatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ.
an8.80:8.6: So nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati … pe …
an8.80:9.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto labhati lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ.
an8.80:9.3: ‘ahaṃ kho gāmaṃ vā nigamaṃ vā piṇḍāya caranto alatthaṃ lūkhassa vā paṇītassa vā bhojanassa yāvadatthaṃ pāripūriṃ.
an8.80:9.4: Tassa me kāyo garuko akammañño māsācitaṃ maññe.
an8.80:9.6: So nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati … pe …
an8.80:10.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhuno uppanno hoti appamattako ābādho.
an8.80:10.3: ‘uppanno kho me ayaṃ appamattako ābādho atthi kappo nipajjituṃ.
an8.80:10.5: So nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati … pe …
an8.80:11.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhu gilānā vuṭṭhito hoti aciravuṭṭhito gelaññā.
an8.80:11.6: So nipajjati, na vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:11.8: Imāni kho, bhikkhave, aṭṭha kusītavatthūni. (8)
an8.80:12.1: * Aṭṭhimāni, bhikkhave, ārambhavatthūni.
an8.80:12.3: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṃ kattabbaṃ hoti.
an8.80:12.6: Kammaṃ kho mayā karontena na sukaraṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ.
an8.80:12.7: Handāhaṃ paṭikacceva vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an8.80:12.8: So vīriyaṃ ārabhati appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāya.
an8.80:13.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā kammaṃ kataṃ hoti.
an8.80:13.4: Kammaṃ kho panāhaṃ karonto nāsakkhiṃ buddhānaṃ sāsanaṃ manasi kātuṃ.
an8.80:13.5: Handāhaṃ vīriyaṃ ārabhāmi appattassa pattiyā anadhigatassa adhigamāya asacchikatassa sacchikiriyāyā’ti.
an8.80:14.1: Puna caparaṃ, bhikkhave, bhikkhunā maggo gantabbo hoti.

an8.80:19.4: Ṭhānaṃ kho panetaṃ vijjati yaṃ me ābādho paccudāvatteyya.
